channel.title: CVE Feed for WPFactory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPFactory -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51399|2024-08-02T22:32:09.197Z -- wpfactory -- back%20button%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPFactory Back Button Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Back Button Widget: from n/a through 1.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-47547|2024-08-02T21:09:37.430Z -- wpfactory -- products%2C%20order%20%26%20customers%20export%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPFactory Products, Order & Customers Export for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.0.7 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-36689|2024-08-02T16:52:54.376Z -- wpfactory -- wpfactory%20helper
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPFactory WPFactory Helper plugin <= 1.5.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-31276|2024-08-02T01:46:04.719Z -- wpfactory -- products%2C%20order%20%26%20customers%20export%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPFactory Products, Order & Customers Export for WooCommerce.This issue affects Products, Order & Customers Export for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30536|2024-08-02T01:38:59.835Z -- wpfactory -- slugs%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPFactory Slugs Manager.This issue affects Slugs Manager: from n/a through 2.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-34370|2024-06-04T17:41:30.872Z -- wpfactory -- ean%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WPFactory EAN for WooCommerce allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects EAN for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.8.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-30536|2024-03-31T18:31:51.934Z -- wpfactory -- slugs%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPFactory Slugs Manager.This issue affects Slugs Manager: from n/a through 2.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-31276|2024-06-10T16:07:41.040Z -- wpfactory -- products%2C%20order%20%26%20customers%20export%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPFactory Products, Order & Customers Export for WooCommerce.This issue affects Products, Order & Customers Export for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-30536|2024-07-09T13:18:28.148Z -- wpfactory -- slugs%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPFactory Slugs Manager.This issue affects Slugs Manager: from n/a through 2.6.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-34370|2024-08-02T02:51:10.873Z -- wpfactory -- ean%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in WPFactory EAN for WooCommerce allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects EAN for WooCommerce: from n/a through 4.8.9.
